name: Fruit BubbleCrush
description:
Fruit Bubble Crush is a most exciting connect Fruit bubbles game.

swipe you finger to connect Fruits with the same Fruit, every level you have Different seconds & Target to crush bubble,reach the target and go next level.

Features:
=> Colourful Fruit bubbles.
=> Easy to learn, but hard to master.
=> props to help you get more points.
=> 25 Levels With Different Target
=> Cool Sounds

How to play:
1. Line two or more Fruit bubbles to make them crush.
2. Line 6 or more bubbles will get prop.
3. More Fruit more points.

Play the Fruit bubble crush game and challenge with your friends.
